profile.name: Otto Kafka
profile.headline: Software Developer & YouTuber
profile.summary:
Otto interests reaches much further than just building RestAPI's or architecting entire systems. He's fascinated by the use of AI particularly convolutional neural networks. On his spare time he is learning a new computer language like Go or Rust.

Otto knows his way around the frontend and the backend. Although, he can work both stations proficiently, he prefers the backend and system design. Definitely a functional programmer versus the class based programmer although he can adapt to his environment. He always stays updated with the newest and latest tech.

about.text:
Otto interests reaches much further than just building RestAPI's or architecting entire systems. He's fascinated by the use of AI particularly convolutional neural networks. On his spare time he is learning a new computer language like Go or Rust.

Otto knows his way around the frontend and the backend. Although, he can work both stations proficiently, he prefers the backend and system design. Definitely a functional programmer versus the class based programmer although he can adapt to his environment. He always stays updated with the newest and latest tech.

positions.title: Senior Back-End Developer
positions.description:
interested in the lasted and greatest technologies.

Using the latest and greatest technologies to build Demand Side Platform (DSP) that uses open source openRTB protocol.

Created an SSP emulator to mimic real Supply Side Platforms.


Building api's in NodeJS. Spends a lot of time on on architecture and scalability with the tech stack MERN ( MongoDB, Express, React, NodeJS).

Database Systems: knowledge in SQL databases such as MySQL & PostgreSQL & none relational databases such as MongoDB

NGINX: A strong know how with NGINX
Rewriting in Go Lang for intense cpu operations. ( currently using NodeJS)
Automated Ui testing: Selenium and Python ( Jupiter notebook)
Testing: api testing with Postman & Teamcity
see less

positions.title: Content Creator
positions.description:
- Coding Tutorials
JavaScript, Node.js, Dart, Flutter, Android & iOS dev

positions.title: Full Stack Flutter Android and iOS Developer, Freelancer
positions.description:
Architected Full Stack projects from scratch. Created high performant backend api's with Node.js. Built backends with concurrency in mind by using the cluster node.js library. Used the Flutter SDK for android and iOS development. Wrote Flutter code with re-usability and maintainability in mind. Used the Websocket protocol to handle real time communication for chat features and such. Worked immensely with MongoDB for storing and querying data. Worked tremendously with Google Console Cloud to host Linux Ubuntu Servers for the Node.js REST API's.
see less

positions.title: Full Stack / Tech Marketing Engineer
positions.description:
Wrote backend API's in NodeJS.
Used Mongodb for the database for storing and querying data.
Wrote test scripts in python. Worked with test engineers for stress testing and general testing.

Computer languages used:
C++, Python, JavaScript, Golang

Everyday tools used:
Docker, Ubuntu server, Unix, git, Bash / Shell

Streamed lined developer tools and updated developer documentation.

Tech Marketing:
Participated with Marketing and developed campaigns for targeted markets.
Held tech conferences and Hackathons in South Korea.
Held tech conferences in Serbia, Montenegro, and Japan.
Held forums teaching developers how to integrate tech into their business and software.

Skills: C++, Javascript, Python, Go
Frameworks: React, Redux, ExpressJS
see less

positions.title: Full Stack / Blockchain Developer
positions.description:
Computer languages & frameworks used:
JavaScript / Node.js, React.js,
Python

Responsibilities include:

Built user friendly de-centralized web apps (DAPPS) with JavaScript / react.js for the blockchain.

Wrote smart contracts for the blockchain using JavaScript.

Updated backend API’s with Node.js

Updated developer documentation.
Created Blockchain developer tools and tutorials.
Created educational technical tutorials for Blockchain developers.
